mapper.select: select ASK_NO, ASK_TITLE, ASK_ID, ASK_CONTENT, ASK_REGDATE, ASK_GROUP_NO, ASK_STEP, ASK_REPLY_FLAG, AUTHORITY_NO from ASK order by ASK_NO desc, ASK_GROUP_NO desc, ASK_STEP

select ASK_NO, ASK_TITLE, ASK_ID, ASK_CONTENT, ASK_REGDATE, ASK_GROUP_NO, ASK_STEP, ASK_REPLY_FLAG, AUTHORITY_NO from ASK where AUTHORITY_NO=#{authorityNo} order by ASK_NO desc, ASK_GROUP_NO desc, ASK_STEP

select ASK_NO, ASK_TITLE, ASK_ID, ASK_CONTENT, ASK_REGDATE, ASK_GROUP_NO, ASK_STEP, ASK_REPLY_FLAG, AUTHORITY_NO from ASK where ASK_REPLY_FLAG=#{askReplyFlag} order by ASK_NO desc, ASK_GROUP_NO desc, ASK_STEP
select ASK_NO, ASK_TITLE, ASK_ID, ASK_CONTENT, ASK_REGDATE, ASK_GROUP_NO, ASK_STEP, ASK_REPLY_FLAG, AUTHORITY_NO from ASK where ASK_No=#{askNo} order by ASK_NO desc, ASK_GROUP_NO desc, ASK_STEP
mapper.insert:
select ASK_seq.nextval from dual
insert into ASK(ASK_NO, ASK_TITLE, ASK_CONTENT, ASK_ID, ASK_GROUP_NO, ASK_STEP, ASK_REPLY_FLAG, AUTHORITY_NO ) values(#{askNo}, #{askTitle}, #{askContent}, #{askId}, #{askGroupNo}, #{askStep}, #{askReplyFlag}, #{authorityNo})
